installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# DB Backup Tool Installation mit Git-Debugging

set -e  # Exit on any error

declare -r DIR="/mnt/server"
declare -r APP_DIR="${DIR}/db-backup-tool"
declare -r GITHUB_REPO="{{GITHUB_REPOSITORY}}"
declare -r BRANCH="{{GITHUB_BRANCH}}"

echo "================================="
echo "DB BACKUP TOOL INSTALLATION"
echo "================================="
echo "Repository: ${GITHUB_REPO}"
echo "Branch: ${BRANCH}"
echo "Target Directory: ${APP_DIR}"
echo "Current Directory: $(pwd)"
echo "================================="

# Installiere System-Dependencies
echo "[1/7] Installing system dependencies..."
apt update
apt install -y wget curl gnupg2 software-properties-common git

# Installiere Node.js
echo "[2/7] Installing Node.js..."
curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_18.x | bash -
apt install -y nodejs

# Installiere Database Tools
echo "[3/7] Installing database tools..."
apt install -y mysql-client || apt install -y default-mysql-client || echo "MySQL client failed"
apt install -y postgresql-client || apt install -y postgresql-client-common || echo "PostgreSQL client failed"

# MongoDB Tools
echo "[4/7] Installing MongoDB tools..."
curl -fsSL https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-7.0.asc | gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-server-7.0.gpg
echo "deb [ arch=amd64,arm64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-server-7.0.gpg ] https://repo.mongodb.org/apt/debian bookworm/mongodb-org/7.0 main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-7.0.list
apt update
apt install -y mongodb-database-tools || echo "MongoDB tools failed"

echo "[5/7] Verifying tools..."
echo "Node.js: $(node --version)"
echo "NPM: $(npm --version)"
echo "Git: $(git --version)"
echo "mysqldump: $(which mysqldump || echo 'NOT FOUND')"
echo "pg_dump: $(which pg_dump || echo 'NOT FOUND')"
echo "mongodump: $(which mongodump || echo 'NOT FOUND')"

# Wechsle zum Zielverzeichnis
cd "${DIR}" || { echo "ERROR: Cannot change to ${DIR}"; exit 1; }

# Entferne alte Installation
echo "[6/7] Setting up repository..."
if [ -d "${APP_DIR}" ]; then
    echo "Removing old installation..."
    rm -rf "${APP_DIR}"
fi

# CRITICAL: Git Repository Setup mit ausf√ºhrlicher Diagnose
echo "================================="
echo "GIT REPOSITORY SETUP"
echo "================================="
echo "Repository URL: ${GITHUB_REPO}"
echo "Branch: ${BRANCH}"
echo "Target: ${APP_DIR}"

# Teste Repository-Zugriff
echo "Testing repository access..."
if ! git ls-remote --heads "${GITHUB_REPO}" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "ERROR: Repository is not accessible!"
    echo "Please check:"
    echo "1. Repository URL is correct"
    echo "2. Repository is public"
    echo "3. Repository exists"
    echo "URL: ${GITHUB_REPO}"
    exit 1
fi
echo "‚úì Repository is accessible"

# Teste Branch-Existenz
echo "Testing branch existence..."
if ! git ls-remote --heads "${GITHUB_REPO}" | grep -q "refs/heads/${BRANCH}$"; then
    echo "ERROR: Branch '${BRANCH}' does not exist!"
    echo "Available branches:"
    git ls-remote --heads "${GITHUB_REPO}" | sed 's/.*refs\/heads\///'
    exit 1
fi
echo "‚úì Branch '${BRANCH}' exists"

# Klone Repository
echo "Cloning repository..."
if ! git clone -b "${BRANCH}" "${GITHUB_REPO}" "${APP_DIR}"; then
    echo "ERROR: Git clone failed!"
    exit 1
fi
echo "‚úì Repository cloned successfully"

# Verifikation nach dem Klonen
echo "================================="
echo "POST-CLONE VERIFICATION"
echo "================================="
cd "${APP_DIR}" || { echo "ERROR: Cannot change to ${APP_DIR}"; exit 1; }

echo "Current directory: $(pwd)"
echo "Directory contents:"
ls -la

# Pr√ºfe kritische Dateien
echo "Checking critical files..."
if [ ! -f "package.json" ]; then
    echo "ERROR: package.json not found!"
    echo "Repository contents:"
    find . -type f -name "*.json" -o -name "*.js" | head -10
    exit 1
fi
echo "‚úì package.json found"

if [ ! -f "server.js" ]; then
    echo "ERROR: server.js not found!"
    exit 1
fi
echo "‚úì server.js found"

# Validiere package.json
echo "Validating package.json..."
if ! node -e "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8'))"; then
    echo "ERROR: package.json is invalid!"
    echo "Content:"
    cat package.json
    exit 1
fi
echo "‚úì package.json is valid"

# Installiere Dependencies
echo "[7/7] Installing Node.js dependencies..."
npm cache clean --force
if ! npm install --production; then
    echo "ERROR: npm install failed!"
    echo "Trying with --legacy-peer-deps..."
    if ! npm install --production --legacy-peer-deps; then
        echo "ERROR: npm install failed completely!"
        exit 1
    fi
fi
echo "‚úì Dependencies installed"

# Erstelle Verzeichnisse
echo "Creating directories..."
mkdir -p backups logs config public
echo "‚úì Directories created"

# Erstelle config.json
if [ ! -f "config.json" ]; then
    echo "Creating config.json..."
    cat > config.json << 'EOF'
{
  "server": {
    "port": 8080,
    "host": "0.0.0.0"
  },
  "security": {
    "sessionSecret": "change-this-secret-key-in-production",
    "jwtSecret": "change-this-jwt-secret-in-production",
    "defaultAdmin": {
      "username": "admin",
      "password": "admin123"
    }
  },
  "backup": {
    "defaultPath": "./backups",
    "maxBackups": 10,
    "compression": true
  },
  "logging": {
    "level": "info",
    "file": "./logs/app.log"
  },
  "updates": {
    "autoUpdate": true,
    "repository": "{{GITHUB_REPOSITORY}}",
    "branch": "{{GITHUB_BRANCH}}"
  }
}
EOF
    echo "‚úì config.json created"
fi

# Erstelle update.sh
echo "Creating update.sh..."
cat > update.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
# Auto-Update Script

echo "üîÑ Checking for updates..."

# Backup current config
if [ -f "config.json" ]; then
    cp config.json config.json.backup
fi

# Backup schedules
if [ -f "backups/schedules.json" ]; then
    cp backups/schedules.json backups/schedules.json.backup
fi

# Check git repository
if [ ! -d ".git" ]; then
    echo "‚ùå Not a git repository"
    exit 0
fi

# Fetch and update
git fetch origin
LOCAL=$(git rev-parse HEAD)
REMOTE=$(git rev-parse origin/{{GITHUB_BRANCH}})

if [ "$LOCAL" = "$REMOTE" ]; then
    echo "‚úÖ Already up to date"
else
    echo "üîÑ Updating..."
    git reset --hard origin/{{GITHUB_BRANCH}}
    npm install --production
    mkdir -p backups logs config public
    
    # Restore backups
    if [ -f "config.json.backup" ]; then
        mv config.json.backup config.json
    fi
    if [ -f "backups/schedules.json.backup" ]; then
        mv backups/schedules.json.backup backups/schedules.json
    fi
    
    echo "‚úÖ Update completed"
fi
EOF

chmod +x update.sh
echo "‚úì update.sh created"

# Erstelle leere schedules.json
echo "[]" > backups/schedules.json
echo "‚úì schedules.json created"

# Erstelle .gitattributes
echo "* text=auto" > .gitattributes
echo "‚úì .gitattributes created"

# Setze Berechtigungen
chmod 755 .
chmod 644 config.json package.json server.js 2>/dev/null || true
chmod 755 backups logs config public 2>/dev/null || true
echo "‚úì Permissions set"

# Finale Verifikation
echo "================================="
echo "FINAL VERIFICATION"
echo "================================="
echo "Working Directory: $(pwd)"
echo "Git Repository: $(git remote get-url origin)"
echo "Git Branch: $(git branch --show-current)"
echo "Git Commit: $(git rev-parse --short HEAD)"
echo "Node.js: $(node --version)"
echo "NPM: $(npm --version)"
echo "================================="
echo "CRITICAL FILES:"
ls -la package.json server.js config.json
echo "================================="
echo "DIRECTORIES:"
ls -la backups/ logs/ config/ public/
echo "================================="

# Test application
echo "Testing application startup..."
if timeout 5s node -e "console.log('App test OK'); require('./server.js')" 2>/dev/null; then
    echo "‚úì Application test passed"
else
    echo "‚ö† Application test timeout (normal during installation)"
fi

echo "================================="
echo "üéâ INSTALLATION COMPLETE!"
echo "================================="
echo "Repository: ${GITHUB_REPO}"
echo "Branch: ${BRANCH}"
echo "Target: ${APP_DIR}"
echo "Default Login: admin / admin123"
echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  Change default password after first login!"
echo "================================="

# Absolute final check
if [ ! -f "package.json" ] || [ ! -f "server.js" ]; then
    echo "CRITICAL ERROR: Installation incomplete!"
    echo "Missing files after installation!"
    exit 1
fi

echo "‚úì All checks passed - installation successful"
